attributes.action: Enforce new guildlines for schools to abide by when dealing with bullies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Schools must implement new rules; all reoffending bullies must complete an anger management programme before returning to the class room, must sign non-reoffending contract if broken they are immediately excluded. bully moved from class/set not victim. bully escorted to/from school. bully given 'community service' -litter picking/cleaning. bullies parents supervise extreme cases during school. add confidential victims/witnesses report box. have family counselling. remove 'no blame' the bully needs to know what they are doing is wrong! victims to be protected and heard during and after bullying. victims human rights taken into account first
